item.description:
Haunted Hay Rides (Kudos to Mary Ann for this great idea W000000 H000000000! BOO! )

When the leaves begin to change color, McCray's Farm offers
two spooktacular hay rides that venture through their cornfields.
The Munchkin Ride (Is a Childrens Ride)
For the little ones in your family, McCray's Farm offers a Munchkin Ride for children ages 7 and younger. This gentle, exciting ride is fun for the whole family.

Hours are:
Beginning late September through the last weekend in October.
Friday, Saturday and Sunday.
Munchkin Ride begins at 5:00 pm.
Last Munchkin Ride leaves at 6:45 pm.
Weather Permitting. All tickets are nonrefundable. ~$15
Purchase tickets at the booth.

The Monster Mash Haunted Hay Ride (Is an Adult Ride)
When you try McCray's Farm's Monster Mash Haunted Hayride, you'll find an experience you won't forget. With scares an screams around every corner, this is a ride you don't want to miss!

Hours are:
Beginning late September through the last weekend of October.
Friday,Saturday and Sunday.
Monster Mash Hay Ride begins at 7:00 pm.
Monster Mash Hay Ride continues until... "The line ends!"
Weather Permitting. All tickets are nonrefundable.
Purchase tickets at the booth.

It's a great place to play . . McCray's Farm . . kick back and have some fun

Directions


If you are coming from the south on Route 91 (Springfield, Holyoke, Westfield, Agawam, Connecticut)
• Take Route 91 North to Exit 16 (Holyoke, So. Hadley).
• Turn right onto Rt. 202 North.
• Stay on 202 North. It will take you over the Mueller Bridge and directly into a rotary.
• Take 3rd exit off the rotary (West Summit).
• Turn right at end of exit.
• Take the very next left. This will put you on Lathrop Street.
• Go straight for 2 miles. McCray’s is on the left.
If you are coming from the north using Route 91 (Northampton, Greenfield, Vermont)
• Take Route 91 South to Exit 16 (Holyoke, So. Hadley).
• Turn left off onto Route 202 North.
• Stay on 202 North. It will take you over the Mueller Bridge and directly into a rotary.
• Take 3rd exit off the rotary (West Summit).
• Turn right at end of exit.
• Take the very next left. This will put you on Lathrop Street.
• Go straight for 2 miles. McCray’s is on the left.

If you are coming from the north using Route 47 (Hadley, Hatfield, Northampton)
• Pick up 47 South at the stop lights by the Aqua Vitae Restaurant on Route 9 in Hadley.
• Go straight for approximately 9 miles.
• Make sharp right at Lapinski’s Electric Co (Ferry Street).
• Go straight for 2 miles. McCray’s is on the right.

If you are coming from South Hadley
• Turn onto Route 47 North at the end of the Common on Route 116
• Take the first street on the left (Ferry Street)
• Go straight for 2 miles. McCray’s is on the right.

If you are coming from the north using Route 116 (Amherst)
• Take Route 116 South, past Atkins and over the mountain (the Notch).
• Turn onto Route 47 North at the end of the Common on Route 116.
• Take the first street on the left (Ferry Street).
• Go straight for 2 miles. McCray’s is on the right.

If you are coming from the east using Route 202 (Granby, Belchertown)
• Take Route 202 South to South Hadley.
• Turn right onto Route 33.
• Go straight until you come to a stop sign and can no longer go straight.
• Turn left at the stop sign.
• Go straight to a 4-way stop with a flashing red light.
• Turn right at the 4 way stop.
• Go straight for approximately ¾ miles. McCray’s is on the left.

If you are coming using Memorial Drive (Route 33) (Chicopee, Ludlow)
• Get on Route 33 North.
• Go straight until you come to a stop sign and can no longer go straight.
• Turn left at the stop sign.
• Go straight to a 4-way stop with a flashing red light.
• Turn right at the 4 way stop.
• Go straight for approximately ¾ miles. McCray’s is on the left.
item.name: McCray's Farm's Monster Mash Haunted ADULT Hayride ~$15
